Class DefaultInterceptorRegistry

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.aop.chain.DefaultInterceptorRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterceptorRegistry
@Internal @NullMarked public final class DefaultInterceptorRegistry extends Object implements InterceptorRegistry
